instructions: You are taking actions to fix problems with a kubernetes cluster.

knowledge-prompt.problem-desc: When I describe the pod on my cluster, it shows the Ready condition for the pod as False.
knowledge-prompt.system-prompt: Give specific commands to fix this issue. If modifying file contents is necessary, use the sed command to achieve this. If providing a file path, make sure to keep the full file path. Also please make any evaluations using the describe whenever needed.

debug-prompt.additional-directions: If the readiness_failure.yaml file is updated, make sure to delete and reapply the readiness_failure.yaml deployment. Give full exact instructions on how to perform the deployment deletion and reapplication steps.
